summary: This document is an email chain from June 2020 discussing the transmission of documents related to the Epstein investigation. The emails show efforts to locate and forward requested documents, with references to individuals compiling and reviewing materials.

events.title: Email chain regarding Epstein document transmission
events.description: Email correspondence discussing the location and forwarding of documents pertaining to the Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated June 22-23, 2020, indicating ongoing document requests related to the Epstein investigation.
The correspondence references that documents pertaining to Epstein were sent to an individual for review.
The email mentions potential misplacement of mailed documents due to office closures during the pandemic.
